languages.text: {n}Хор сервиторов послушно повторяет ваши слова, но кажется — не до конца понимает их. Номос отвлечены — огромный когитатор продолжает петь свою скрипучую песню, ведя неизвестные вычисления.{/n}

{n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хор сервиторов послушно повторяет ваши слова, но кажется — не до конца понимает их. Номос отвлечены — огромный когитатор продолжает петь свою скрипучую песню, ведя неизвестные вычисления.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}El coro de servidores repite fielmente tus palabras, aparentemente sin entenderlas. Nomos está ocupado con otra cosa. El colosal cogitador sigue con su chirriante canción, ejecutando cálculos desconocidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El coro de servidores repite fielmente tus palabras, aparentemente sin entenderlas. Nomos está ocupado con otra cosa. El colosal cogitador sigue con su chirriante canción, ejecutando cálculos desconocidos.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターたちの合唱が耳に入った言葉を繰り返すが、特に理解している様子はない。ノモスは何かに気を取られている。巨大な考算機は、未知の計算を実行しながら、きしむような歌を歌い続けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターたちの合唱が耳に入った言葉を繰り返すが、特に理解している様子はない。ノモスは何かに気を取られている。巨大な考算機は、未知の計算を実行しながら、きしむような歌を歌い続けている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}机仆们恭敬地齐声重复你的话语，但似乎并不理解这些话是什么意思。而诺莫斯这台巨大的沉思者，依然在全神贯注继续唱着它吱吱作响的歌，进行着未知的计算。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工们恭敬地齐声重复你的话语，但似乎并不理解这些话是什么意思。而诺莫斯这台巨大的思考器，依然在全神贯注继续唱着它吱吱作响的歌，进行着未知的计算。{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Le chœur des servitors répète vos paroles sans toutefois sembler en comprendre le sens. Nomos est préoccupé : l'énorme cogitateur qui continue son chant grinçant en effectuant de mystérieux calculs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le chœur des servitors répète vos paroles sans toutefois sembler en comprendre le sens. Nomos est préoccupé : l'énorme cogitateur qui continue son chant grinçant en effectuant de mystérieux calculs.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Der Chorus der Servitoren wiederholt pflichtbewusst deine Worte, offenbar aber ohne sie zu verstehen. Nomos ist beschäftigt. Der riesige Cogitator singt weiter sein krächzendes Lied und führt unbekannte Berechnungen durch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chorus der Servitoren wiederholt pflichtbewusst deine Worte, offenbar aber ohne sie zu verstehen. Nomos ist beschäftigt. Der riesige Cogitator singt weiter sein krächzendes Lied und führt unbekannte Berechnungen durch.{/n}
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör korosu, sözlerini sadakatle fakat anlamaksızın tekrar ediyor. Nomos ise meşgul. Dev kavramsayar, cızırtılı şarkısını söylerken meçhul hesaplamalar yapmayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of servitors dutifully repeats your words, but seemingly without understanding them. Nomos is preoccupied — the huge cogitator continues to sing its creaking song, running unknown calculations.{/n}

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
